root.name: Space Tripper
root.description: OverviewSpace Tripper was developed by UK-based Pom Pom Games and release by Crystal Interactive in 2001. It was the debut release for Pom Pom, who have since gone on to make Mutant Storm Reloaded, Mutant Storm Empire and Bliss Island for Xbox Live Arcade.Space Tripper's gameplay is comparable to bi-directional scrolling shoot 'em ups like Defender and Uridium. The action is spread across four worlds, encompassing fourteen levels.ReceptionThe game was praised by critics at the time for the purety of its gameplay. PC Gamer magazine awarded it 92% and went on to re-release the game in 2003 as part of the PC Gamer Presents... budget classics range (published by Mastertronic)SequelPom Pom are currently developing a sequel called Astro Tripper for the PC and Playstation Network.
